activities: M&I may collect personal information in conjunction with a registrant/delegate's willful submission of the requested information in order to register for an event, respond to a survey, obtain airline tickets, or to pay for services rendered for a program. All data collected is entered directly by the person affected.
contacttitle1: Vice President, IT Services & Information Security and Data Privacy Officer
corpofftitle1: Vice President, IT Services & Information Security and Data Privacy Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline data of our customers personal information to secure travel needs and pay for services, as well as M&I HR data
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
